mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.fangwu_uuid_number as fangwuUuidNumber ,a.fangwu_loudong as fangwuLoudong ,a.fangwu_danyuan as fangwuDanyuan ,a.fangwu_fanghao as fangwuFanghao ,a.fangwu_types as fangwuTypes ,a.fangwu_content as fangwuContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM fangwu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.fangwu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangwuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.fangwu_loudong like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangwuLoudong},'%')
and a.fangwu_danyuan like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangwuDanyuan},'%')
and a.fangwu_fanghao like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangwuFanghao},'%')
and a.fangwu_types = #{params.fangwuTypes}
and a.fangwu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangwuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
